website_summaries.verdict: Very affordable fan that is well made and super quiet.
pros: Comes with a 4-foot USB cable, although you can also run it with a DC cable (not included)
cons: Some customers felt this option wasn't powerful enough and didn't provide enough airflow

customer_reviews.title: Great fan and super quiet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these fans for work at my cubicle, I loved it some much, that I just order another one. It is very quiet and blows a good amount of air; works so well, that at time I would have to shut it off and I'm a person that is always hot and never wears a jacket in the cold. So this is a A+ fan...
customer_reviews.author: Firas-13

customer_reviews.title: This can is the BEST
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this fan is so awesome! For such a small little fan it pushes a lot of air! I live in the upstairs room where it gets really hot and stuffy. I have this fan sitting on an end table, with my laptop, aimed at my bed. It keeps me cool and comfortable. I also use it in a minivan that we converted to a little camper van. This fan does such a good job of keeping it cool and comfortable. We were beyond impressed and pleased with it. All in all, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: C-swizzle

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is perfect, at first I thought it was not going to be powerful and even if it was powerful it would be too loud! Nope that is not the case, it works great! I love it!! The only con to me is the power button it was a little annoying have to reach behind it to turn it on but as you can see in the photo I just tied it to the front for easy reach! It wasn’t enough for me to remove a star!
customer_reviews.author: Ray T.

customer_reviews.title: Blows a nice gentle breeze and is very quiet.
customer_reviews.text: I made a personal air conditioner for my dog. It works great! It is very quiet! Blows air down over a block of ice, under a separator wall and out the exhaust tube onto his couch.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Walker

customer_reviews.title: Using 24/7 to cool overheating cable modem and router.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this running nearly 24/7 for 7 months now. I have a Nighthawk router that overheats. This fixed that problem. I also have a cable modem that reset every few days. It fixed that problem too. I run this fan 24/7 on both and I have had to reset my system only once since then. And that was due to a city power outage. I set the modem on a shelf near a wall, then the nighthawk router screwed to the wall above it. The fan blows air over the modem and up the wall to the Nighthawk router. Two birds, one stone, and it runs off USB power from the Nighthawk. No extra outlets required.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: This fan went to my daughter in Puerto Rico, ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan went to my daughter in Puerto Rico, where she has no power, no AC, no lights. This fan was a godsend - she can run if off a battery pack that is charged during the day at her office.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Harrity

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the office. Also, handy in a blackout or emergency.
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan! I started a new job and one of the offices I spend time at keeps their temp just a few couple degrees above my comfort level. This fan is incredibly quiet, very lightweight, and moves the perfect amount of air. I am testing to see how long it will run off of a 10,000 mA power pack.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk G. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for my desk. You must plug into your tower or lab top and presto a quiet fan to keep you cool. My office is pretty warm and the other ladies in my office liked it and all bought one. Too bad I bought mine too soon because the office manager ended up paying for everyone's fan and expensed as office supplies. I had already bought mine a month prior and paid for my own. Lol. Oh well, it didnt cost much anyway.
customer_reviews.author: prettyface

customer_reviews.title: Cute little fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little fan, it’s not the best air flow but for the price you really can’t beat it. Bought it for the break room at the job. So long as you sit close to it, it does it’s job decent enough. Overall happy with the purchase. Only concern is how cheap it feels. Feels like it’ll break fairly easily so use with extra caution. I am being very careful around it so it does not break any time soon
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Read Details before you buy
customer_reviews.text: I like this fan, but I didn't read the details very well before I bought it. It was bigger than what I needed and it doesn't come with a plug. It only plugs into a USB. Luckily I had a few USB plugs from previous phones lying around. I meant to buy it for my work desk but it's too big. Now I am using it for a personal fan next to my bed. It is a incredibly lightweight fan that makes very little noise. But just enough to have a little white noise, if that's something you're interested in.
customer_reviews.author: kala

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ForMy Mini Tower PC
customer_reviews.text: I was having some heating issues with a Dell mini tower. I had another small fan which didn't seem to cool it off much, & 2 of them (the fans) also died. So far, this one though it blows less air & is quite quiet is keeping things much cooler. I don't think it would help for room comfort, but perfect for the pc, & has a USB power jack. So far, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: G. Ratcheson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent USB desk fan
customer_reviews.text: Excellent USB-powered desk fan. Whisper-quiet, nothing rattles. Blows good air. Shipping was prompt, and the product was well-packaged. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A good USB powered fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best UBS powered fan I own. It is quiet, moves a good quantity of air and its easy to take apart for cleaning. I will be buying another two for my wife and son. A good product and a good buy! I had first purchase this fan a few months ago for myself, and I was so impress that I came back and purchase another 10 as gifts.... The fan has metal blades and is wisper quiet, while at the same time pushing out a good volume of air.... You just can’t beat it for the price....
customer_reviews.author: Drexel Deal

customer_reviews.title: Moves serious air, whisper quiet.
customer_reviews.text: For a USB-powered fan, this thing moves some serious air without rattling, whining, or otherwise making a bunch of noise. It is bigger than other USB fans I have used, but is a perfect size for a desk and after roughly 2 months of use (approx. 8 hours/day), it still works as well as when unboxed. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Zack Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Not a mini fan - but I should have measured
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this 5 stars because it works well, but the fault was mine. I needed a 4 inch mini fan for the desktop to cool down the back of my Mac. This is too large for that purpose - it’s 7 inches across, and it won’t fit in that small space. I stupidly should have measured. This fan is like the momma bear of desk fans. I use it at work instead, and it works very well. Very lightweight and not too noisy. Note - USB plug only.
customer_reviews.author: ava

customer_reviews.title: Really Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Very please with this product. I use it for my office desk, very quiet, barely notice it even on. Even though it is small, it still blows a good amount of air and keeps me cool. I only wish that it had the option for changing the speed from low to high. All in all, great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Antonia E.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. I use this for my desk and for ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. I use this for my desk and for the dog crate. It's outside the crate. The air is gentle so it's not intrusive, but effective, so you can stay cool. My small dogs won't tolerate any other fan for five minutes but this, because it's not hard air. I use an a/c adapter with no problems. The same goes for the usb port.
customer_reviews.author: P.Lantia

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The only thing stopping me from giving it 5 star ; I wish it had 2 speeds. Otherwise it's absolutely Great. It's very quite. I work in a fast pace ob/gyn office. The constant moving can make it extremely hot. This fan is a life saver
customer_reviews.author: Roberta D.

customer_reviews.title: Wire frame fits over visor!
customer_reviews.text: Best part is wire frame fits over visor! Well made, light weight, low current draw, plastic bends wont break, adequate air flow. Use it all day everyday in car. Glue pivot points to frame with e6000 glue because that fall off.
customer_reviews.author: MSvendsen

customer_reviews.title: Personal Fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who loves to play computer games online. He loves it and brings it with him even when he’s just sitting and playing with a cell phone. You can use the usb wall charger for iphones if you want to plug it to a power outlet. It’s light but sturdy enough for a small fan. The usb cord is a little bit short though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lazaro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little 4 watts fan!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these little helect fans now, and I love them. Even the older one still runs great. Used for camping, they easily run off my solar panels or battery. Only use 4 watts per fan and they make a nice breeze for their size.
customer_reviews.author: inger lise

customer_reviews.title: Quality for an unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use in my office which is forever warm. It's been running 24/7 for nearly two months and hasn't shown one sign of slowing down. Quality for an unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool little fan
customer_reviews.text: So my work makes a big deal about plugging _anything_ into a wall without getting approved. This was a great workaround by going into the usb port of my workstation. Works like a champ, im in Arizona so this keeps it cool.
customer_reviews.author: Socalr32

customer_reviews.title: FANtastic purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little desk fan, it's actually whisper quiet. I'd give it a 4/5 for airflow, 5/5 for the switch, and 6/5 for being so darn quiet. Worth every penny to me.
customer_reviews.author: Data

customer_reviews.title: Wow, quiet, soft air.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and easy setup. Its perfect lightweight and quiet. The breeze is soft and perfect for avoiding night sweats or overheating at the computer.
customer_reviews.author: EJC

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep computers cooled off and great for keeping ...
customer_reviews.text: Great to keep computers cooled off and great for keeping my miniature schnauzer puppy 🐶 chilling in his crate at night or during his naps
customer_reviews.author: Lora J. Hanrahan

customer_reviews.title: Great for hot flashes ladies!
customer_reviews.text: This Lil thing works wonders...perfect if you have your desktop tower on your desk due to its USB...when I tell you she blows...she blows!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Adams

customer_reviews.title: Never would have guessed
customer_reviews.text: Needed this so my switch would stop overheating. Very impressed by this little fan. Love the turn off button, it's fun to press. Also it's quiet and light weight with a nice gust.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Latza

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: This little Fan is Great, it gives you a lot of air, and very low Noise level. My only complaint is that it only has one level for the air output and sometimes it's too cold and I can't turn it down.
customer_reviews.author: Sky514

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Moves a fair amount of air. Slightly louder than the fan it replaced, but, it replaced a smaller diameter fan, so, it's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, very light
customer_reviews.text: Very light, so much so that it feels like it would be very easy to break. It's very quiet, however the entire fan vibrates when running. It moves a decent amount of air, but I liked the OPOLAR F501 much better.
customer_reviews.author: MrsB

customer_reviews.title: Fan-tastic
customer_reviews.text: Great little office fan at work. Puts out enough air, but not too powerful to push papers off my desk. USB power is a plus for me. Wish it has 2 or 3 speeds, but the one it has is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: It's fine, just buy it
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute little sub-$10 USB fan. It's just what I expected. I needed something to create a little breeze at my desk. This does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Becky J

customer_reviews.title: Usb Fan
customer_reviews.text: First fan arrived doa. The seller reached out and sent me a replacement at no cost. The replacement works fine, and moves a lot of air. This fan is bigger than a typical usb fan, and much quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This pushes a lot of air. My use case is having it usb powered from some networking devices blowing on some fabless units. It dropped the temps considerably.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Randomson

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet and good force!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! Great value for $9.99. I have this on my desk at work for those intermittent “personal summers”. It’s a bit bigger than I expected but I did not measure beforehand. Still fits nicely under my computer monitor. Super quiet and nice output. Comes with lifetime warranty too
customer_reviews.author: Wendela38

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my desk at work
customer_reviews.text: its perfect for work it is bigger then the what others have on their desk which I love cant hear it so it doesn't bother me while im on the phone
customer_reviews.author: jill unger

customer_reviews.title: SUPER LIGHTWEIGHT AND SILENT!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my classroom! SILENT, LIGHTWEIGHT and puts out a nice breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Weaver

customer_reviews.title: 1 speed. It feels okay
customer_reviews.text: I use for the kitchen. It's 1 fast speed. Not super cool but better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: USB port driven
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works beautifully... just wish there were more speeds than just off/on!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA R AMMON

customer_reviews.title: BEST UBS Fan I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: This fan is phenomenal. It rivals "regular" fans that I've used before. Hands down worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Adams

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure my coworkers were "borrowing" it after I left
customer_reviews.text: Not the quietest fan, but having the power switch on the cable is great (opposed to the back of the fan), and it moves a lot of air.
customer_reviews.author: One

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, simple, functional.
customer_reviews.text: The reviews here weren't kidding: it's the quietest fan I've ever seen (and not heard)! Got this for my desk at the office as it runs very hot. I suspect I will use it with a portable battery pack in the summer to beat the heat while camping.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Best usb fan ever? I even purchased a couple more for coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K

customer_reviews.title: I love this fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. Its perfect for my desk and I can plug it right into my laptop instead of searching for a plug. Its small enough to blow a controlled breeze but large enough to keep me cool. Its stand can be a little awkward for where I wanted it to sit. It also has an on and off switch!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra F. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Portable and Travel-Ready
customer_reviews.text: I bought a solar USB charger for this and it works great on the go or the great outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Been outside working in a mini greenhouse off a small solar panel for about a month. Still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... not take up much space and does send a pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I can use it as USB or AC with adapter which is the way I am using now it does not take up much space and does send a pretty good breeze
customer_reviews.author: Heri

customer_reviews.title: Grat Fan
customer_reviews.text: Decent little fan. Blows a decent amount of air. Best part is I hook it up to a portable battery pack and it runs well off that. That's why i bought it, for a portable fan.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff.R35

customer_reviews.title: FANtastic!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fan. It sits right by my computer! Best part is the noise level. I work on the phones and have never had anyone say they could hear a fan. It’s very strong and blows great air!
customer_reviews.author: Alayna Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great fan. It’s so quiet and lightweight. Even our pets like it and try to hog it by sitting in front of it.
customer_reviews.author: Marigold23

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Got as a gift for my boyfriend who ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Got as a gift for my boyfriend who spends a lot of time doing projects/homework on the computer. Our house does not have A/C so it gets extremely hot and muggy in our computer room. This fan is great to have on a desktop to get some relief from the heat. Doesn't take up much room and is pretty much completely silent
customer_reviews.author: Kryss Reishus

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than I thought but my area at work gets hot in the afternoons, and this is perfect for the little blasts of cool air I need (instead of using a manilla folder).
customer_reviews.author: ChargerBabe

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my cube. I had a different one that was too loud and I had to turn it off when I was on the phone because you would hear the air hitting the speaker. This is so small and quiet and it blows enough air to keep you cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fan. Quiet and no vibrations for me. Perfect work desk fan.
customer_reviews.author: Junque21

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Moves a good amount of air and is sufficiently quiet.
customer_reviews.author: TRK

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. My office gets extremely hot with the heater blowing, so this fan comes in handy. Can't wait to use it for the summer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D

customer_reviews.title: I got this for a cruise in the cabin at ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a cruise in the cabin at night, made enough noise to drown out anything in the hallway, but not so loud to keep you awake. And it fit in my bag well.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, great for keeping equipment cool
customer_reviews.text: This little fan lives behind my monitor and blows cool air on my CPU and router. It's very quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Columbine Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Its a fan!
customer_reviews.text: it worked out of the box it only come with a usb power source :( 1 speed... also :( it is really quiet only thing left is to see how long it lasts...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved it so much I bought another. Nice big breeze

customer_reviews.title: These are very good and i have one at work and home offices
customer_reviews.text: Even use them in my truck. Seem to have very low current draw too.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Got my fan in the mail today and it just does not work. Very very disappointed in this fan.

customer_reviews.title: It's better price and design than others but not specifically for football.
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight and looks awesome. I wonder if the colours would change if i ask for a red one or a clear colored fan with the branding the color it is of course.I admire your dedication (good).

customer_reviews.title: Great little office fan
customer_reviews.text: This little fan is amazing!!! Very powerful and lightweight. I keep it at my desk in the office. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love his fan. I work in a call center and this fan is very quite but powerful. It really helps me cool down and not feel stuck in the same hot air.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Not too loud. Perfect for my desk at work during the heat of the summer.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and moves a lot of air, for a USB powered fan.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fan
customer_reviews.text: Pretty quiet fan, instant cooling, not distractingly loud. If this ever breaks I’ll instantly buy another one!

customer_reviews.title: Cools nicely and VERY quiet
customer_reviews.text: Cute, compact fan that I use on my desk at work. Cools nicely and VERY quiet. It's made of lightweight plastic and it even tilts up and down. Perfect for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quiet fan
customer_reviews.text: The 7" fan blade can move alot of air, which the smaller fans can't. If it is too much air, I just direct it away.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and efficient. Is perfect size for nightstand. I can reach over and turn it off and on as needed. Will be good to take on trips. The USB plug is a bonus as it works with my portable charger. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: simple fan seems to have a good amount of air flow for a little fan.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my desk at work nice when the air gets too stagnant for me
customer_reviews.text: Lots of airflow from this little USB fan! Keeps my desk at work nice when the air gets too stagnant for me.

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet 🤫
customer_reviews.text: Works great and very quite. A longer cord would be a nice thing.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Love this little fan. It works great and doesn't make a lot of noise.

customer_reviews.text: Fan is very good has a very strong air flow

customer_reviews.title: Noise level
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my guinea pig and he sits in front of it all day long. It’s super quiet. I wish it had different speed settings but it’s definitely worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Very good price

product_meta.title: Helect USB Fan, 7-Inch Frame Mini USB Table Desk Personal Fan Quiet Rotatable (Black) - H1055
feature_bullets: USB fan is perfect for the office, home, dorm, study, library, games room and more

Made of ABS that supports strong airflow up to 145 CFM. Power supplied by 4ft USB cable or DC Plug Socket (NOT included). Compatible with computers, laptops, portable chargers and other devices with USB ports
The solid 7-inch frame with 360 degree rotatable operation for you to adjust the angle that fits you the best
On/off switch to control the fan easily. Ultra-silent working mode provides a quiet working environment while keeping you cool and relaxed
Package includes: USB fan with 4ft USB cable, customer service card

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars909 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
